org.wildfly.security.auth.server

Interface RealmMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MappedRegexRealmMapper, SimpleRegexRealmMapper

    public interface RealmMapper
    A realm mapper. Examines the user name and translates it into a realm name.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RealmMapper DEFAULT_REALM_MAPPER
      A realm mapper which always maps to the default realm.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getRealmMapping(String userName)
      Get the realm mapping.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_REALM_MAPPER

        static final RealmMapper DEFAULT_REALM_MAPPER
        A realm mapper which always maps to the default realm.

    • Method Detail

      • getRealmMapping

        String getRealmMapping(String userName)
        Get the realm mapping. Return null if the default realm should be used.
        Parameters:
        userName - the user name
        Returns:
        the realm, or null to use the default realm
